sentence.text: protein polyubiquitination-25-3p, miR-30a-5p, miR-328 and miR-363-3p directly targeted adhesion-related genes, including negative regulation of endodermal cell differentiation, visual perception, cell adhesion mediated by integrin, proteolysis and negative regulation of angiogenesis. miR-363-3p and miR-328 inhibited proliferation of renal cancer cells, while miR-25-3p inhibited adhesion, promoted proliferation and migration of renal cancer cells.

entity.text: negative regulation of endodermal cell differentiation

sentence.text: The analyzed microRNAs, their target genes and TGF-protein localization to cilium formed a network of strong correlations in tissue samples from renal cancer patients.
The expression signature of microRNAs linked with TGF-protein localization to cilium levels correlated with poor survival of renal cancer patients.
